content:
Some of the IGs have a great rendering of the capability statement (e.g., US Core -- https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CapabilityStatement-us-core-server.html with IG Publisher Version: v0.9.92-SNAPSHOT) and some have a very poor rendering (e.g., Formulary -- http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-formulary/CapabilityStatement-usdf-server.html IG Publisher Version: v1.0.35-SNAPSHOT ).

Did IG Publisher lose the capability to generate the richer rendering at some point?

Or is there something I need to do or somebody I need to pay to get the nice rendering?

Happy 2020!
the us core one is hand written
That certainly explains it....thx and happy new year
By hand written gg means that us core uses a custom template to generate the narratives from the resources. as a stand alone script.
